name: PolarRuin
description:
Background Music: Nordic Landscape by John Leonard https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/nordic-landscape-68...

3D Ruin Models: Altar Ruins Free by loan Stan  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/altar-ruins-free-109065

Axe Model: FREE - RPG Weapons by Blink https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/free-rpg-weapons-199738

Fire Particle System : Procedural fire by Hovl Studio https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/procedural-fire-141496

Sky Materials: AllSky Free - 10 Sky / Skybox Set by rpgwhitelock https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/allsky-free-10-s...
